job_title: Youth Therapist in Dearborn Heights, MI
pros: I really enjoyed the chance to work with the girls.  Seeing how they interacted with their parents and siblings during family counseling gave me a lot of information about what was going on within the family.  I loved running groups whether they were fun ones, like making Christmas ornaments, or something more serious like anger management.
cons: The sheer amount of paperwork and the expectation that my direct supervisor had that I would understand immediately what she wanted done.  Different counties had different expectations and it was a lot to manage.  You could easily work 12 hour days when you first start because you don't know how to fit everything in.  It turns out, I was expected to count things like going to court with a youth or going to their psychiatric appointment as being their therapy session for the week.  How is that therapy?
